LOCAL GOVERNMENT STUDIES  
  
 ATAPOLY    
 BAYELSA    
CABSP

KAD-POLY   
KAN-POLY 
KONDUGA  
NASPOTEC   
RAMAT-POLY   
UAS-POLY  
WUFPOBK  
ZUNGERU  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English 
Language not Literature in English and 
Mathematics and any three (3) subjects 
from the following 
Economics/Commerce,  
Business Methods,  
Principles of Accounts,  
Literature in English  
Geography  
Office Practice  
Government,  
Biology/Agricultural Science,  
Chemistry,  
Physics,  
History/Government 
Typewriting  Shorthand.  
  
Government or History 
and any two (2) of  
Economics, Commerce,  
 Geography  and  
Mathematics  
  
a)  
b)  
c)  
d)  
IBD-POLY and KAD-POLY require ‘O’ level credit 
passes to include English Language and ‘O’ level 
pass in Mathematics.  
IBD-POLY requires ‘O’ level credit pass in 
Government. Accepts CRS/IS, Yoruba, History 
and ‘O’ level in Mathematics. Also accepts any of 
the listed O\Level course requirements as UTME 
subjects.  
PLS-POLY requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language and three (3) others from 
Government/History, Economics, Commerce, 
Geography, Biology/Agricultural Science, 
IS/CRS.  
KAN-POLY accepts Cer tificate in Local 
Government Studies or Public Administration of  
Kano Polytechnic plus five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes in Mathematics, English Language, 
Economics, Accounts, Government/History, 
Biology, Agricultural Science, Geography, 
Commerce.  
 
PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE AT THE NATIONAL DIPLOMA (ND) AND ENTRY REQUIREMENTS   
POLYTECHNIC/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  REMARKS/WAIVER  
   e) CABSP accepts Certificate Course of the College or 
from any recognised institution OR any other 
qualification recognized by the College Academic 
Board.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
a)    KAD-POLY accepts Literature in English,          
CRS/IRS and Agricultural Science/Biology          
among optional subjects.
